languages.text: "Пробиваться с боем к дворцу Администратума и убедиться, что пожар или другое бедствие не уничтожило важные для следствия бумаги — надеюсь, у клерков хватило ума спасать в первую очередь записи, а не свои жизни. Если Император будет благоволить нам, мы успеем изъять важные данные или допросить выживших, а после нанесем визит губернатору — к нему накопились вопросы".

"Fight our way to the local Administratum palace and ascertain whether a fire, or some other disaster, hasn't destroyed the documents related to the investigation — I hope the clerks were smart enough to put the records before their lives. If the Emperor favours us, we will extract the data we need or else interrogate the survivors before we pay our visit to the governor — the questions we have for him are beginning to pile up."
languages.original_text: "Пробиваться с боем к дворцу Администратума и убедиться, что пожар или другое бедствие не уничтожило важные для следствия бумаги — надеюсь, у клерков хватило ума спасать в первую очередь записи, а не свои жизни. Если Император будет благоволить нам, мы успеем изъять важные данные или допросить выживших, а после нанесем визит губернатору — к нему накопились вопросы".

languages.text: "Wir kämpfen uns zum Palast des Administratums durch und werden sicherstellen, dass die für die Untersuchung relevanten Dokumente nicht durch ein Feuer oder eine andere Katastrophe zerstört wurden. Ich hoffe, die Beamten waren klug genug, die Aufzeichnungen über ihr eigenes Leben zu stellen. Falls uns der Imperator gewogen ist, werden wird die erforderlichen Daten extrahieren oder die Überlebenden befragen, ehe wir dem Gouverneur einen Besuch abstatten ... er wird uns einige Fragen beantworten müssen."
languages.original_text: "Fight our way to the local Administratum palace and ascertain whether a fire, or some other disaster, hasn't destroyed the documents related to the investigation — I hope the clerks were smart enough to put the records before their lives. If the Emperor favours us, we will extract the data we need or else interrogate the survivors before we pay our visit to the governor — the questions we have for him are beginning to pile up."

traits.locale_text: "Wir kämpfen uns zum Palast des Administratums durch und werden sicherstellen, dass die für die Untersuchung relevanten Dokumente nicht durch ein Feuer oder eine andere Katastrophe zerstört wurden. Ich hoffe, die Beamten waren klug genug, die Aufzeichnungen über ihr eigenes Leben zu stellen. Falls uns der Imperator gewogen ist, werden wird die erforderlichen Daten extrahieren oder die Überlebenden befragen, ehe wir dem Gouverneur einen Besuch abstatten ... er wird uns einige Fragen beantworten müssen."

languages.text: « Nous frayer un chemin jusqu'au palais local de l'Administratum et nous assurer qu'aucun incendie ou autre catastrophe n'a détruit les documents relatifs à l'enquête. J'espère que les intendants ont eu la présence d'esprit de faire passer les archives avant leurs vies. Si l'Empereur nous sourit, nous récupérerons les données dont nous avons besoin ou nous interrogerons les survivants avant de rendre visite au gouverneur. Les questions que nous avons à lui poser ne cessent de s'accumuler. »
languages.original_text: "Fight our way to the local Administratum palace and ascertain whether a fire, or some other disaster, hasn't destroyed the documents related to the investigation — I hope the clerks were smart enough to put the records before their lives. If the Emperor favours us, we will extract the data we need or else interrogate the survivors before we pay our visit to the governor — the questions we have for him are beginning to pile up."

traits.locale_text: « Nous frayer un chemin jusqu'au palais local de l'Administratum et nous assurer qu'aucun incendie ou autre catastrophe n'a détruit les documents relatifs à l'enquête. J'espère que les intendants ont eu la présence d'esprit de faire passer les archives avant leurs vies. Si l'Empereur nous sourit, nous récupérerons les données dont nous avons besoin ou nous interrogerons les survivants avant de rendre visite au gouverneur. Les questions que nous avons à lui poser ne cessent de s'accumuler. »

languages.text: «Abrirnos paso hasta el palacio del Administratum local y determinar si algún incendio o desastre similar ha destruido los documentos relacionados con la investigación; confío en que los escribas hayan tenido el buen juicio de protegerlos con sus vidas. Si el Emperador nos sonríe, obtendremos los datos que necesitamos o, en su defecto, interrogaremos a los supervivientes antes de hacer una visita al gobernador. Se nos empiezan a amontonar las preguntas».
languages.original_text: "Fight our way to the local Administratum palace and ascertain whether a fire, or some other disaster, hasn't destroyed the documents related to the investigation — I hope the clerks were smart enough to put the records before their lives. If the Emperor favours us, we will extract the data we need or else interrogate the survivors before we pay our visit to the governor — the questions we have for him are beginning to pile up."

traits.locale_text: «Abrirnos paso hasta el palacio del Administratum local y determinar si algún incendio o desastre similar ha destruido los documentos relacionados con la investigación; confío en que los escribas hayan tenido el buen juicio de protegerlos con sus vidas. Si el Emperador nos sonríe, obtendremos los datos que necesitamos o, en su defecto, interrogaremos a los supervivientes antes de hacer una visita al gobernador. Se nos empiezan a amontonar las preguntas».

languages.text: “我们打算一路杀到当地的内政部宫殿，看看相关的卷宗有没有在火灾或其他灾害中保存下来。我希望那些职员足够机灵，能意识到那些资料比他们的生命更加重要。如果帝皇保佑的话，我们应该能找到我们需要的资料，或是审问一下幸存者。在此之后，我们要去见总督一面，我这里有很多问题需要他解释清楚。”
languages.original_text: "Fight our way to the local Administratum palace and ascertain whether a fire, or some other disaster, hasn't destroyed the documents related to the investigation — I hope the clerks were smart enough to put the records before their lives. If the Emperor favours us, we will extract the data we need or else interrogate the survivors before we pay our visit to the governor — the questions we have for him are beginning to pile up."

traits.locale_text: “我们打算一路杀到当地的内政部宫殿，看看相关的卷宗有没有在火灾或其他灾害中保存下来。我希望那些职员足够机灵，能意识到那些资料比他们的生命更加重要。如果帝皇保佑的话，我们应该能找到我们需要的资料，或是审问一下幸存者。在此之后，我们要去见总督一面，我这里有很多问题需要他解释清楚。”

languages.text: 「地元の行政局宮殿まで戦い抜き、火災か他の災害によって調査関連の書類が失われていないかを確認します。事務員たちが、自分の命よりも記録を優先するだけの分別を持っていることを祈ります。皇帝陛下のご加護があれば、必要なデータを入手できるでしょうし、そうでなければ、生存者を尋問して聞き出すことになります。いずれにせよ、総督に投げかけるべき質問は山のように積もりつつあります」
languages.original_text: "Fight our way to the local Administratum palace and ascertain whether a fire, or some other disaster, hasn't destroyed the documents related to the investigation — I hope the clerks were smart enough to put the records before their lives. If the Emperor favours us, we will extract the data we need or else interrogate the survivors before we pay our visit to the governor — the questions we have for him are beginning to pile up."

traits.locale_text: 「地元の行政局宮殿まで戦い抜き、火災か他の災害によって調査関連の書類が失われていないかを確認します。事務員たちが、自分の命よりも記録を優先するだけの分別を持っていることを祈ります。皇帝陛下のご加護があれば、必要なデータを入手できるでしょうし、そうでなければ、生存者を尋問して聞き出すことになります。いずれにせよ、総督に投げかけるべき質問は山のように積もりつつあります」

languages.text: "Savaşarak yerel Administratum sarayına ilerlemeyi ve soruşturmayla ilgili belgelerin bir yangında veya başka bir felakette yok edilip edilmediğini öğrenmeyi amaçlıyoruz. Umarım kâtipler canlarından önce bu kayıtları düşünecek kadar akıllılık etmiştir. İmparator yardımcımız olursa ya ihtiyacımız olan veriyi elde ederiz ya da önce hayatta kalan kişilerin ifadesini alıp sonra valinin kapısını çalmaya gideriz. Valiye sorulması gereken yığınla soru birikti."
languages.original_text: "Fight our way to the local Administratum palace and ascertain whether a fire, or some other disaster, hasn't destroyed the documents related to the investigation — I hope the clerks were smart enough to put the records before their lives. If the Emperor favours us, we will extract the data we need or else interrogate the survivors before we pay our visit to the governor — the questions we have for him are beginning to pile up."
